You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Zscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B5.
  * `&zscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4CF.
